setDescription: Set your birthday date on the server.

set.userDescription: Which user do you want to set the date of birth for? - MANAGER ONLY.
set.success: Your birthday has been set to {{date}} on this server.
set.success_target: {{target}}'s birthday was set to {{date}} on this server
set.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You are not allowed to manage other users birthdays.
set.hasNotPermissionToManageThisUser: You cannot manage the birthdays of users above you hierarchically.

remove.userDescription: Remove a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
remove.notRegistered: Your birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to set it.
remove.notRegistered_target-manager: {{target}}'s birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to set it.
remove.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You don't have permission to remove birthdays
remove.hasNotPermissionToManageThisUser: You don't have permission to remove this user's birthday.

show.userDescription: Show a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
show.title: {{emoji}} Birthday
show.description_target-manager: {{emoji}} {{target}}'s birthday is at the {{date}}. If you want to change it, use {{command}}.
show.notRegistered: Your birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to set it.
show.notRegistered_target-manager: {{target}}'s birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to set it.

test.userDescription: Test a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
